name: Inoculation
description:
This is the short demo of Inoculation.

You play as Winston who is an upper middle class business man who's world gets flipped due to a mysterious outbreak. Roughly based on current events.

This game is made possible only through sheer will power. If you enjoyed the concept please consider supporting by purchasing the Windows downloadable version. That will help us continue pursuing our passion on delivering great games.

Also, genuine feedback is invaluable and deeply appreciated.
